title: snowflake.snowpark.Session.append_query_tag | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Appends a tag to the current query tag. The input tag is appended to the current sessions query tag with the given separator.
tag – The tag to append to the current query tag.
separator – The string used to separate values in the query tag.
Assigning a value via session.query_tag will remove any appended query tags.
